amendment.description: To provide for the establishment of summer health career introductory programs for middle and high school students.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1548 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1548 proposed by Senator Specter for Senator Campbell. (consideration: CR 9/11/03 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11321) To provide for the establishment of summer health career introductory programs for middle and high school students.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1548 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1548 proposed by Senator Specter for Senator Campbell.
